name: Larry the Rainbow Octopus
description:
You are a the last rainbow octopus and the fisherman crew  ROF

  • Rainbow
  • Octopus
  • Fisherman

wants to get you, dead or alive, they do not care.

Movement : WASD

Goal : Uhh dont get hit by the arrows

Not here

No matter which game gets the most votes, Im going to be the winner. I had fun making this game.
